article_title: 'Bethlehem is empty of joy - no Santa, no celebration'
sentence: A  week  ago,  Jawdat's  grandmother,  Naheda  Khalil  Anton  -  who  was  also  sheltering  in  the  church  in  Gaza  -  was  shot  twice  in  the  stomach  as  she  was  on  her  way  to  the  bathroom.

article_title: 'Bethlehem is empty of joy - no Santa, no celebration'
sentence: His  aunt  Samar  Kamal  Anton  rushed  to  help  her  and  was  shot  in  the  head.

article_title: 'Bethlehem is empty of joy - no Santa, no celebration'
sentence: Through  tears,  Han'na  says  that  his  two  family  members  died  before  his  eyes:  "It  was  a  shock. . .  It  was  unbearable.  "

article_title: 'Bethlehem is empty of joy - no Santa, no celebration'
sentence: "We  cannot  celebrate  with  a  lot  of  people  killed  in  Gaza,"  says  Abood  Subouh,  a  shop  owner  in  the  local  market  just  off  Manger  Square.
